title: Swan Fake
description: Cinderella Cleaners has just received a shipment of dance costumes for a big upcoming performance. Diana's friend, Amelia, is supposed to be in the show...BUT she needs Diana to secretly fill in for her. Not only does Diana owe her friend a favor, but she fits perfectly into the costume! Will she convincingly be able to dance ballet, or will her "glass slippers" break?
author: Maya Gold
